item.title: Bitget has launched U-based XNY and AIO perpetual contracts
item.description: August 13th. As per an official announcement, Bitget has declared the listing of U-Settled XNY and AIO perpetual contracts, and the contract trading BOT has been launched simultaneously.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Cuts ETH Short Position After $25.4M Loss, BTC Bear Adds to Position Against the Trend with $12.6M Paper Loss
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, the market continued to rise. The Hyperliquid whales urgently adjusted their positions to avoid liquidation. These adjustments included:The whale with the address starting with 0x20c2d9 reduced its ETH short position by $1.0665 million. Currently, it has an unrealized loss of $25.414 million and a liquidation price of $6,068.533.The whale with the address starting with 0x5d2f446 increased its BTC short position by $1.3576 million. Currently, it has an unrealized loss of $12.6078 million and a liquidation price of $127,734.796.

item.title: Standard Chartered Bank: Raises Year-End Ethereum Price Outlook to $7500
item.description: On Wednesday, August 13th, Standard Chartered Bank raised its year-end price target for Ethereum from $4000 to $7500. This was due to the increased industry participation in recent months and a rise in Ethereum holdings. The new price target represents a nearly 60% increase compared to Ethereum's over 3.5-year high of $4700 reached on Wednesday.As the second-largest cryptocurrency in the world, Ethereum has become the top choice for investors seeking higher returns. Unlike Bitcoin, which only relies on price appreciation, Ethereum can be used for staking. Holders can lock up tokens to support the Ethereum network and receive rewards. In the past four weeks, driven by the passage of the "Infrastructure Bill", Ethereum's price has surged by more than 50%. The bill aims to establish a regulatory framework for USD-backed stablecoins, and the market expects this to increase their adoption and drive up the prices of crypto assets, including Ether.Geoff Kendrick, the Head of Digital Asset

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Past $122,000
item.description: On August 13th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin experienced a rebound and exceeded $122,000, registering a 24-hour increase of 2.55%.

item.title: Tom Lee: Ethereum Will Be the Biggest Macro Trading Opportunity in the Next 10–15 Years
item.description: On August 13th, Lee, the newly appointed chairman of BitMine, stated that with AI creating a token economy on the blockchain and Wall Street financializing on the blockchain, Ethereum can be regarded as the biggest macro transaction opportunity in the next 10 to 15 years.

item.title: Pendle TVL Surpasses $9 Billion, Hits All-Time High
item.description: On August 13th, Pendle TVL exceeded $9 billion and reached a brand new all-time high. Among this total, $6.4 billion is in PTs.Yesterday, Aave raised the limit of PT-USDe (September 2025) by $600 million, and this entire increase was completely utilized. As a consequence, Pendle's TVL using PT as collateral rocketed to a brand new all-time high of $4.6 billion.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $121,000
item.description: On August 13th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin saw a rebound and managed to break through $121,000, registering a 24-hour gain of 2.42%.

item.title: Sharplink LSETH Position Unrealized PnL has reached $323 million
item.description: On August 13th, as reported by Cointelegraph, it was disclosed that the unrealized profit and loss of the LSETH held by Sharplink Gaming amounts to $323 million.BlockBeats Note: LSETH is a kind of Liquid Staking Derivative (LSD), representing a liquidity voucher obtained by staking Ethereum (ETH). Its core function is to enable users to continuously earn ETH staking rewards while maintaining the liquidity of assets. They can further participate in yield stacking or trading through DeFi protocols.

item.title: US Stock Market's Three Major Indexes Open Higher, Cryptocurrency-related Stocks Experience Broad Gains
item.description: On August 13th, based on Rockflow market data, at the opening of the U.S. stock market, the Dow increased by 0.4%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.3%, and the Nasdaq Composite went up by 0.38%. U.S. stock market cryptocurrency concept stocks witnessed a general rise, including:· Sharplink Gaming rose by 4.52%;· Bitmine rose by 10.27%;· Strategy rose by 0.61%;· Coinbase rose by 3.01%;· HOOD rose by 0.90%;· BTCS rose by 1.98%.

item.title: A whale who accumulated Ethereum last November has now taken profit on the entire position, making over $7.5 million.
item.description: On August 13th, according to the monitoring of @EmberCN, Whale 0xe42...08A was noticed to have accumulated 6,918 ETH when the price was $3,613 on November 30 of last year. After holding for 9 months, one hour ago, it began to split in three transactions and transferred all the tokens to Binance, finally achieving a profit of $7.52 million.
